name: Fantasy Adventures-Early Access
description:
This is the latest RPG by Bowers Gaming LLC. This is a fantasy game with multiple classes and weapons. Travel to different towns and attack monsters.

WalkThrough:
Once you start the game you'll be given a choice on
gender, name, appearance and Party members
after which, you'll be placed in Dewberry one of the
main towns in the game, once there talk to the Mod
and he'll ask you to either do the Tutorial or not
and will give items to help you get started.
IT IS RECCOMENDED TO PLAY THE TUTORIAL FOR 1ST TIMERS
once the tut is done head on out of the town by going
down and explore the area, you can mine rocks and
chop trees for items needed for crafting gear, fight
monsters for items, gold, and EXP then once you feel
up to the task, there is a dungeon at the top middle
of the map go in and beat it, once you're done talk to
the soldier that appears by the dungeon then it's
recommended that you go back to the town and buy
items to help on your adventure, once your ready
and are at the level go back to the soldier and enter
the Mystery dungeon portion, when you beat it talk to
the soldier again and you'll have a choice to play
the HARD MODE dungeon once cleared talk to the
soldier again and you'll unlock Hard Mode Mystery
Dungeon, after beating that go talk to the mod again
he'll ask if you want to fight the Bounty that's
around the lake in the middle of the map, accept then
head to the left edge of the lake and there will be
a mage there waiting there, talk to the mage and
accept freezing the lake and fight the bounty, after
beating it go back to the mod and talk to him.

After that, if you want you can face against the Dojo master's student
for a reward of all class weapons better than the current HQ weapons
